front.title: Extensions to RSVP-TE for P2MP LSP Egress Local Protection

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for locally protecting egress nodes of a Traffic Engineered (TE) point-to-multipoint (P2MP) Label Switched Path (LSP) in a Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) network.
